name: Pink Guy's: Dodgeball in Dream Court
name_original: Pink Guy's: Dodgeball in Dream Court
description:
Pink Guy's: Dodgeball in DreamCourt
These ball guys really love dodgeball! Suck up the balls and shoot em at other ball guy!

Player 1 - Blue Guy
WASD - Move
Space Bar - Hold to Suck/Press to Shoot

Player 2 - Pink Guy
Arrow Keys - Move
Enter - Hold to Suck/Press to Shoot

Download the Windows build which will quit after the game is over.
